General.Name: Caturkarda Depo Bangunan PT Tbk
General.Description: PT Caturkarda Depo Bangunan Tbk operates building materials supermarket in Indonesia. It offers range of products, which includes flooring, paint and sundries, sanitary and plumbing, builders hardware, electrical and lighting, houseware, and other products. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Raya Serpong Km.2, Tangerang, Indonesia, 15325
